animeTitle: Kuro Kishi to Shiro no Maou VR Sennyuu! Maoujou-hen
animeDescription: VR anime of mobile RPG Kuro Kishi to Shiro no Maou released via Virtual Gate is an exclusive to "VR Park Tokyo," an amusement center in Japan. Only 4 people can watch it at a time. The viewers must enter a platformed pivot cage and adorn the VR headpiece. The caged area lets the viewer hold onto the bars so they can lean and pivot while watching the VR anime.
